TEXTS.ITEM: U1&FUNCTIONALITY& ASZAPLink framework root exception class. All Exception classes raised from the framework inherit from this class. Have a look to each method for more details. U1&RELATIONS& AS U1&EXAMPLE& AS U1&HINTS& AS U1&FURTHER_SOURCES_OF_INF& AS U1Memories ASThis application is dedicated to the memories of : B2My father : Lamri BENSIALI (1940-2004) without whom I never started programming B2My uncle : Jacky BEDU (1934-2009) who died during the completion of this application
